title: Epic Games just scored a win against Apple
summary: Epic Games notched a win in an ongoing legal dispute with Apple. The result could be Fortnite returning to the U.S. iOS app store as early as next week. Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers said in a ruling Wednesday that Apple was in “willful violation” of a 2021 injunction that prohibited the company from anticompetitive pricing. […]

filter_verdict.reasoning_summary: Significant legal development in a high-profile case between major companies, impacting app store policies but not urgent enough to be breaking.

## Epic Games Scores Legal Victory Against Apple  

Epic Games secured a win in its ongoing Apple legal dispute, with a judge ruling Apple violated a 2021 injunction against anticompetitive pricing. The decision could pave the way for Fortniteâ€™s return to the U.S. iOS App Store as early as next week.  

Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers declared Apple in "willful violation" of the previous order, marking a significant setback for the tech giant. The ruling may force Apple to adjust its App Store policies to comply with antitrust regulations.
